de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib

Class LibProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.utilities.PropertyContainer
      • de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.LibProperties

  • public class LibProperties
extends de.lmu.ifi.dbs.utilities.PropertyContainer
    The property wrapper class for jfeaturelib.properties. This class is used to access the properties of jfeaturelib.properties in an easier way without having to request keys by magic strings. For example in order to obtain the value of sift.binary, you can request LibProperties.get().getFile(LibProperties.SIFT_BINARY).
    See Also:
    PropertyContainer
